hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="ELK-$$" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start rsyslog2-wheezy-cerit-XL
#vm image fixup sleep 60 /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'rm /etc/apt/sources.list.d/puppetlabs.list; apt-get update'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget http://esb3.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog2.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ####/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && git checkout esb20' ################ /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh elk.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x elk/tests/elk.sh'
